value.name: Murder charge for officer accused of killing handcuffed man
value.description: TEMPLE HILLS, Md. -- A Maryland police officer ... The victim was identified as William Howard Green, 43, of Washington, D.C. Authorities did not reveal Green's race, citing department policy.
